title: QueryParameters
description: Query parameters for TTS synthesis - all actual Deepgram TTS API parameters

model.description: AI model used to process submitted text (63+ models available)

callback.description: URL to which callback request will be made

mip_opt_out.description: Opt out of Deepgram Model Improvement Program

bit_rate.description: Audio bitrate in bits per second (default: 48000 bps for mp3)

container.description: Container specifies the file format wrapper for the output audio. Available options depend on encoding type.

encoding.description: Encoding allows you to specify the expected encoding of your audio output. Supported encodings: mp3 (default), opus, flac, mulaw, alaw, aac, linear16

sample_rate.description: Sample rate for output audio in Hz (default: 24000)
